name: Goblin Boom
description:
Embark on the role of a cunning goblin, whose passion is to place explosive bombs around the map.
Your goal is to defeat enemies, complete levels, and become a true master of explosions!
Get ready for an explosive adventure in the world of goblins and bombs!

Game features:
Strategic bomb placement: Choose the locations for bombs wisely.
Explosions and destruction: Bombs shake the ground, destroy walls, and create chaos. Use all the power!
Diverse enemies: Orks, wizards, and warriors will be chasing you! Be on the lookout.
